body:
I got a bad virus on my computer that will be dealt with in about a week, and then I'll be back on Avicus. Half of Avicus doesn't even know me, and the other half probably didn't know I wasn't on much. I have been on but on public library computers under their names. Just wanted to get this fact off my shoulder.


(From my tablet because my computer has some issues as mentioned before xD).

title: Why I Haven't Been On Avicus

replies.body: I'm sorry, but this is considered a personal update. While we are sorry for the state of your computer, the forums are not the place for it.
